mapper.select: select slName,slid,sltap from single order by sltap desc limit 0,5;
select s.slid,s.slsrid,s.slname,s.slaid,s.sltime,s.sllrc,s.sltap,s.slresource,r.srname,r.srid FROM singer r,single s WHERE s.slsrid = r.srid ORDER BY s.sltap desc LIMIT 0,3;

select s.slid,s.slsrid,s.slname,s.slaid,s.sltime,s.sllrc,s.sltap,s.slresource,r.srname,r.srid FROM singer r,single s,album a WHERE s.slsrid = r.srid and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,a.atime,now()) ORDER BY s.sltap desc LIMIT 0,3;
select s.slid,s.slsrid,s.slname,s.slaid,s.sltime,s.sllrc,s.sltap,s.slresource,r.srname,r.srid FROM singer r,single s,album a WHERE s.slsrid = r.srid ORDER BY s.sltap*r.srfan desc LIMIT 0,3;
select s.slid,s.slsrid,s.slname,s.slaid,s.sltime,s.sllrc,s.sltap,s.slresource,r.srname,r.srid FROM singer r,single s WHERE s.slsrid = r.srid and r.srregion='美国' ORDER BY s.sltap desc LIMIT 0,3;
select s.slid,s.slsrid,s.slname,s.slaid,s.sltime,s.sllrc,s.sltap,s.slresource,r.srname,r.srid FROM singer r,single s WHERE s.slsrid = r.srid and r.srregion='韩国' ORDER BY s.sltap desc LIMIT 0,3;
